item.title: Azure Monitor: How To Create Overrides for Log Search Alerts
item.description:
Hello blog readers 😊 How many times have you found yourself in a situation where you created Azure Monitor alerts but the threshold you specified was not applicable to all the targeted resources? The side effects of this were:
You were getting unnecessary alerts You were getting sort of false positives To fix the problem you had to create different alerts for different resources with different thresholds
I faced this problem long time ago, and I blogged about a possible solution in the post called Azure Monitor: Use Dynamic Thresholds in Log Alerts. Despite that approach being effective, it ...
